qas.question: What can use words from different dialects?
What kind of words are excepted from literary use?
When did the preference of use of words from northern dialects begin?
What affect did this favoring of northern dialects have on other dialects?
What kind of choice is now available in word choice?

context: <a0_0>Literary Catalan<a0_0/> allows the use of words from different dialects, except those of very <a1_0>restricted use<a1_0/>. However, from the <a2_0>19th century<a2_0/> onwards, there is a tendency of favoring words of Northern dialects in <a3_0>detriment of others<a3_0/>, even though nowadays there is a <a4_0>greater freedom of choice<a4_0/>.
